sentences: Delegates discussed issues related to the Protocol mechanisms in workshops during the pre-sessional week, a Joint SBI/SBSTA session and in a contact group during SB-12 chaired by Kok Kee Chow (Malaysia).
During the informal week delegates met in three workshops to discuss the Chair's Text for Further Negotiations on Mechanisms.
A Draft Consolidated Text On Mechanisms was drafted based on Parties' inputs, and distributed on Friday, 10 June.
During SB-12, delegates met three times to discuss the draft, indicate areas where their submissions had not been reflected, and add text where necessary.
As a result of the deliberations, a consolidated text on principles, modalities, rules and guidelines was drafted and distributed on Friday, June 16 (Future FCCC/SB/2000/4).
enb_long_title: TWELFTH SESSION OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES OF THE UNFCCC
